title: Hentai Ouji to Warawanai Neko.
synopsis: Youto Yokodera wants to be seen in a way different from most men: as a pervert. However, his lewd actions are often misinterpreted as good intentions, and people cannot see his true nature. Upon hearing rumors of a cat statue that can banish an unwanted trait, he searches for it and prays for his fa√ßade to be removed. But each wish comes at a price: those unwelcomed traits are transferred to someone else who desires them!
